com.github.katjahahn.parser.sections.rsrc

Class ResourceSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.parser.sections.rsrc.ResourceSection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEModule, SpecialSection

    public class ResourceSection
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpecialSection
    Holds the root resource directory table and provides access to the resources.

        Creates an instance of the ResourceSection.

        Parameters:
        file - the PE file
        virtualAddress - the virtual address all RVAs are relative to
        rsrcOffset - the file offset to the rsrc section
        mmBytes - the memory mapped PE
